results = search_pages("2023 film live-action remake Disney animated movie pandemic delay")
if results:

    sections = view_sections(page_id)

        content = read_section(section_id)

# List of Walt Disney Studios films (2020–2029)

*Revision ID: 1160282309 | Timestamp: 2023-06-15T13:44:06Z*

---

List of Walt Disney Pictures films}}

[[Disney Studios Logo.svg|right|182x182px](File:Walt)]

This is a list of films produced by the U.S. film studio [Disney Studios](Walt)(Walt Disney Studios (division)), one of [Walt Disney Company](the)(the Walt Disney Company)'s divisions and one of the [Five" major film studios]("Big)(major film studios). The list includes films produced or released by all existing and defunct labels or subsidiaries of the Walt Disney Studios; including [Disney Pictures](Walt)(Walt Disney Pictures), [Disney Animation Studios](Walt)(Walt Disney Animation Studios), [Animation Studios](Pixar)(Pixar), [Studios](Marvel)(Marvel Studios), [Lucasfilm](Lucasfilm), [Century Studios](20th)(20th Century Studios), [Digital Studio](20th)(20th Digital Studio), [Pictures](Searchlight)(Searchlight Pictures), [Disneynature](Disneynature), [Pictures](Touchstone)(Touchstone Pictures), and [Pictures](Hollywood)(Hollywood Pictures). The list does not include films produced by studios that are now owned by Disney (as part of acquisitions), but were historically not distributed by Disney during their original, initial time of release.

All films listed are [releases](theatrical)(Wide release) unless specified:

* Films labeled with a **‡** symbol signifies a [release](Streaming media) exclusively through [Disney+](Disney+) or its sister services and content hubs.

* Films labeled with a **†** symbol signifies a [video on demand](premium)(Video on demand#Premium) release through [Disney+](Disney+).

* Films labeled with a **§** symbol signifies a [release](simultaneous)(simultaneous release) to theaters and on [video on demand](premium)(Video on demand#Premium) through [Disney+](Disney+).

* Films labeled with a ***** symbol signifies a [release](Streaming media) through a third-party streaming service.
